### About Me

I eat code snippets for breakfast, lunch and even dinner if necessary. I breathe in transistors and dream in algorithm. I geek out over learning and my IDEs are permanently open on every device. The letters JAVASCRIPT embellish the heart that's tattooed on my right shoulder. My favourite quote of all times is "Life is short. You need Python" from Bruce Eckel.
